metadata.titel_preek: Most Trusted, Most Powerful Name in News

primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God acts to open the 'sealed book' of His Word, transforming human blindness and deafness into sight and joy through the power of the Kerygma.

tekstueel_bewijs: God is the agent. God is the subject of the verbs.
God is the one who closes and opens the heart.
The zeal of the Lord of hosts will perform this.

object.identificatie: The opening of the Word / Transformation of the Hearer
tekstueel_bewijs: In that day the deaf shall hear the words of a book
The Word will leap into the hearts of the deaf and blind
Shall the potter be regarded as the clay?
The poor among men shall exult in the Holy One of Israel.
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer is positioned as the Receiver of a 'marvelous thing' they cannot produce themselves.

tekstueel_bewijs: The Spirit of God makes the Word live.
The incarnate Word of God is a mighty sword put into your hand.
helper.rol_van_god: God is both Subject and the source of the Helper.
helper.rol_van_geest: External power that 'descends' to give success.

tegenstander.identificatie: Spiritual Stupor / The Scoffer / The Tyrant
tekstueel_bewijs: The Lord has poured out upon you a spirit of deep sleep
The scoffer shall cease to be
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opposition is not just bad habits but a divinely imposed 'sealed book' and 'deep sleep' that only God can reverse.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The preacher's vocation to wield the 'mighty sword' of the Word despite rejection.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Preacher
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The preacher's action is a participation in God's primary action of opening the Word.

voorbeelden_god_subject: God made, God is, God chose.
The Lord is going to do a marvelous thing.
He is the one who shuts and opens the book.
voorbeelden_mens_subject: The people draw near with their mouth.
We flip back and forth among cable news.

voorbeelden: It is not our job [to open the book].
Power that we crave, power that we want to get close to.
The wisdom of their wise men shall perish.
The Word of God is powerful.
The zeal of the Lord of hosts will perform this.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon is overwhelmingly focused on God's 'Pouvoir' (Power/Ability) to act where humans are 'incompetent' (blind/asleep).

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From the Stupor (S2) and Human Rote (~S1) to the 'Marvelous Thing' (S1) performed by God.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: God breaks the seal; the movement is entirely asymmetrical and divinely initiated.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High; the stupor is described as a 'famine' and 'deadly paralysis'.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon explicitly rejects human effort or 'rote' worship as the solution, placing all agency in God's 'marvelous' intervention.

indicatoren_genade.indicator: God as Subject of active verbs
indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: God made, God is, God chose.
The Lord has poured out upon you a spirit of deep sleep... God is the one who closes and opens.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Biblical figures (Isaiah, Paul) are used as witnesses to God's action, not as moral models.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Theocentric: God is the Potter, we are the clay.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief from the burden of 'making the Word work' and joy in God's power.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Monergistic view of revelation and faith.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The sermon maintains a strict hierarchy where God's action (Soteriology) precedes and enables the preacher's task (Ethics/Vocation).
spanning_punten: The tension between human 'free-thinking' and divine 'election'.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: The power of God moves us into a new place where we can see... our own true story.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit provides the 'Pouvoir' (Power) that the human subject lacks.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is a 'spirit of deep sleep' and a 'sealed book'—an ontological incapacity.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is a textbook example of a grace-oriented narrative structure where God is the primary Actant.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain current balance; it serves the Kerygmatic purpose.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: The opponent (spiritual blindness) is already presented as insurmountable by human effort.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: The sermon masterfully avoids the 'trap of the potter' by keeping God as the Subject of all transformative verbs.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While a rhetorical analysis might focus on the 'news' metaphor, Greimas reveals that the 'news' is actually an Actant (Sender) that changes the Subject's competence.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains the context of Isaiah; Greimas shows how the sermon's 'engine' mirrors Isaiah's own theocentric structure.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas highlights that the 'free-thinker' is an Opponent who lacks the 'Savoir-faire' (true knowledge) because God has not yet granted the 'Pouvoir' (sight).

volledige_subject_lijst: God (made, is, chose, opens, shuts, performs)
The People (draw near, honor with lips, stagger, sleep)
appendices.notities: The sermon explicitly references the 'God as Subject' rule, making it a self-aware piece of homiletical art.
